page.title: 20LOCAL FOOTBALL CLUBS
page.content:
We have several football clubs for boys in our area.Two of them are Yate United. and .St.Nicholas.In our school football is extremely popular.About three quarters of the boys like to play football.About half of those play for a team.Many boys also play for school teams.I find the games I play in are sporting.In my team the players never blame one another.
There have been several football disasters recently.One was the Bradford fire.Perhaps the most disasterous one was the Brussels tragedy where Liverpool supporters broke into the Juventus area and 56 people died in the crush and 209 were injured.Despite these problems in professional football schoolboys still love playing football.
